menuPage.title: Our Menu
menuPage.subtitle: A curated selection of flavors to accompany your moments.
menuPage.noResults: No products found for your search.

specialOrdersConditions.title: Conditions for Special Orders
specialOrdersConditions.line1: • Orders are taken from Tuesday to Sunday from 9 AM to 9 PM.
specialOrdersConditions.line2: • Orders require 48 hours notice with a 50% prepayment.
specialOrdersConditions.line3: • Flavors or decorations not listed must be consulted with production to verify availability and delivery time.

comboSuggestion.title: Packages & Combos
comboSuggestion.description: Discover our special combinations, created for a memorable experience.

SOD-01.name: Sodas
SOD-01.description: Sprite, Sprite Zero, Coca-Cola, Coca-Cola Zero

INF-01.name: Chocolate Sunshine
INF-01.description: Infusion with orange notes and a chocolatey sensation with a hint of cinnamon.

INF-02.name: Cha Cha Chai
INF-02.description: Black tea leaves from Sri Lanka, with rooibos and a touch of toasted cinnamon.

INF-03.name: Pineapple Blues
INF-03.description: South Asian flowers infused with black tea, toasted cinnamon, and pineapple.

INF-04.name: Dolce Vita
INF-04.description: Light and refreshing herbal tea of mint with licorice and anise.

INF-05.name: Jasmine
INF-05.description: Blend of Japanese imperial cut green tea with delicate jasmine petals.

PAS-01.name: Apple Crumble Cake
PAS-01.description: Spiced cake with tender cinnamon-covered apples, wrapped in a colorful golden, crispy crust with salted caramel.

PAS-02.name: Red Velvet Cake
PAS-02.description: Mini red velvet sponge cake, filled with sweet cream cheese frosting and fresh red berries.

PAS-03.name: Carrot Cake
PAS-03.description: Spiced carrot cake with cinnamon and nutmeg, layers of sweet cream cheese frosting, caramelized cheese, and candied nuts.

PAS-04.name: Chocolate Cake
PAS-04.description: Soft and fluffy chocolate sponge cake, filled with homemade strawberry jam, covered with smooth and velvety chocolate cream and chocolate ganache. A feast for the palate.

PAS-05.name: Cheesecake
PAS-05.description: Traditional American cheesecake, graham cracker crust and creamy baked cream cheese filling, served with a red berry reduction (optional).

PAS-06.name: Brownie
PAS-06.description: Love at first bite, a classic ultra-moist texture perfect for all chocolate lovers.

PAS-07.name: Tiramisu Dessert
PAS-07.description: Tiramisu filling with two layers of ladyfingers soaked in coffee syrup with red wine and cocoa powder.

PAS-08.name: Crème Brûlée
PAS-08.description: Thick custard with red fruits, flavored with liqueur and vanilla; covered with a crispy caramel.

PAS-09.name: Yogurt Bowl
PAS-09.description: Greek yogurt and seasonal fruits served with wild honey and a homemade garnish.

PAS-10.name: Orange Pound Cake
PAS-10.description: Sweet cake with orange and vanilla flavor, covered with a layer of orange buttercream.

SAL-01.name: Bruschetta Capri
SAL-01.description: Grilled sourdough bread in olive oil on a bed of homemade pesto, sun-dried tomato, fresh mozzarella cheese, and serrano ham with a touch of balsamic glaze.

SAL-02.name: BLT Croissant
SAL-02.description: Croissant with aioli sauce, crispy bacon on a bed of lettuce and tomato slices.

SAL-03.name: Hawaiian Croissant
SAL-03.description: Cream cheese and ricotta paste, caramelized pineapple, and loin slices.

SAL-04.name: Ham & Egg Croissant
SAL-04.description: Omelette on a bed of romaine lettuce accompanied by smoked loin slices, cherry tomatoes, and a balsamic reduction.

SAL-05.name: Caprese Bruschetta
SAL-05.description: Crispy sourdough bread, fresh mozzarella cheese, basil pesto, and sun-dried tomatoes.

SAL-06.name: Tuna Bruschetta
SAL-06.description: Sourdough bread with olive oil, cilantro-flavored cream cheese, accompanied by tuna, avocado, fresh cucumber slices, and candied cherry tomatoes.

SAL-07.name: French Toast
SAL-07.description: Brioche bread toasts, accompanied by homemade peanut butter and served with Greek yogurt and red berry reduction.

SAL-08.name: Steak Sandwich
SAL-08.description: Toasted ciabatta bread with marinated beef loin, whiskey-caramelized onion, sautéed mushrooms, and smoked provolone cheese, served with jalapeño sauce.

SAL-09.name: Croque Madame
SAL-09.description: Pork leg and mozzarella cheese sandwich au gratin on brioche bread, accompanied by fresh arugula, provolone sauce, and a poached egg.

SAL-10.name: Pork Leg Crostini
SAL-10.description: Sourdough toast. Guacamole, smoked pork leg, and poached eggs, accompanied by mixed greens, purple basil, rich greens, cherry tomatoes with pickled onion.

SAL-11.name: Berry Toast
SAL-11.description: Sourdough toast. Burrata cheese and bacon slices on a bed of arugula, accompanied by strawberries, cherry tomatoes, and fine herbs.

SAL-12.name: Classic Pancakes
SAL-12.description: Decadent and fluffy classic pancakes with whipped cream, seasonal fruits, and wild honey (contains coconut).

SAL-13.name: American Breakfast
SAL-13.description: Complete breakfast with eggs your way, bacon, pancakes, and toast, accompanied by an Americano or cappuccino and a juice (choice of: Pineapple, Coconut, Mango).

SAL-14.name: Omelette Confit
SAL-14.description: Omelette with sour butter flavored with white wine, sourdough toast, mozzarella cheese, mixed greens of the day, and a confit of cherry tomatoes in fine spices, accompanied by an Americano or cappuccino.

SAL-15.name: The Portobello
SAL-15.description: Sourdough toast. Delicious veggie option with fresh ricotta cheese and avocado, sautéed spinach and mushrooms accompanied by cherry tomatoes.

SAL-16.name: Holy Guac
SAL-16.description: Sourdough toast. Scrambled eggs with sour cream, on a bed of guacamole, crispy bacon, and cherry tomatoes with parsley.

SPO-01.name: Whole Pound Cake 8p
SPO-01.description: Spongy cake with orange or lemon flavor, with a light sugar glaze. Also available in vanilla and chocolate in a colorful swirl.

SPO-02.name: Red Velvet Cake (Whole)
SPO-02.description: Our classic from American cuisine. Naked red velvet sponge cake, three layers of sweet cream cheese frosting, and fresh red berries.

SPO-03.name: Carrot Cake (Whole)
SPO-03.description: Moist, soft, and fluffy carrot cake; flavored with cinnamon and a hint of nutmeg. Two layers of sweet cream cheese frosting, candied nuts, salted caramel, and dehydrated carrots.

SPO-05.name: NY Cheesecake 10p
SPO-05.description: Traditional American cheesecake, graham cracker crust and creamy baked cream cheese filling, accompanied by a red berry reduction (optional).

SPO-06.name: Chocolate Cake 10p
SPO-06.description: Moist and soft chocolate sponge cake, filled with homemade strawberry jam. Covered with smooth and velvety chocolate cream and chocolate ganache. A feast for the palate.
